channel.title: Charitras on Swaminarayan Charitra
channel.description: Recent content in Charitras on Swaminarayan Charitra

item.title: Bhuj Ane Muli Mandir No Itihas Ek Sathe / ભુજ અને મુળી મંદિર નો ઇતિહાસ એક સાથે 🛕
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of with history Two temples at the same Muli and Bhuj, About lord Swaminarayan

item.title: મહારાજ ગઢપુર છોડી ને ક્યાં ચાલ્યા ગયા ? 😮 | Maharaj Gadhapur Chhodi Ne Kya Chalya Gya❓
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of Panchala village where maharaj came from Gadhpur without telling anyone, About lord Swaminarayan

item.title: જેતલપુર ની ગણિકા નો ઉદ્ધાર અને યજ્ઞ / Jetalpur Ni Ganika No Uddhar and Yagna
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of Jetalpur yagna and lakshmibai, About divine grace and blessing lord Swaminarayan

item.title: ગોંડલ નરેશ ને મહારાજ ની સ્વરૂપ નિષ્ઠા કેવી હતી ? / Gondal Naresh Ne..
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of Gondal State King and Shreeji Maharaj with Saints, About Swarupnishtha of lord Swaminarayan

item.title: રામાનંદ સ્વામી એ મયારામ ભટ્ટ ને નિશ્ચય કરાવ્યો / Ramanand Swami Ae Mayaram Bhatt Ne Nishchay Kravyo
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of Ramamnand Swami guided Mayaram Bhatt towards God, About loard Swaminarayan

item.title: હો રસિયા મેતો શરણ તિહારી / Ho Rasiya Me to Sharan Tihari
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of premanand swami and they recalls the memory, About lord Swaminarayan

item.title: કરજીસણ ગોવિંદભગત ની રાખડી 📿 | Karjisan Na Govind Bhagat ni Rakhadi
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of Govind Bhagat who came annually for the shravan month in Gadhda, About lord Swaminarayan

item.title: તીર્થ જાવુ તઇ ઘરસંસારની ઉપાધી મેલી ને જ જાવુ 🙆‍♂️ | Tirhte Javu Tai Gharasansarani Upadhi Meli Ne J Javu
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of Lakha bhagat and he dreamed about his farm | About lord Swaminarayan

item.title: દાદાખાચર નું સમર્પણ | Dada Khachar Nu Samarpan 🙇‍♂️
item.description: This charitra is from Gadhpur and it is based on the Dedication towards Gopinathji Maharaj

item.title: એક પંથ દો કાજ / Ek Panth Do Kaj
item.description: This charitra is from Gadhpur and this is about ekadashi jagran of all saints , About lord Swaminarayan

item.title: Jetalpur Ma Govind Swami Sathe Shreeji Maharaj 🎉
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of Jetalpur jetalpur village with Govind Swami, Shreeji Maharaj, About yagna done by lord Swaminarayan

item.title: કડવા ભગત ની મહારાજ પ્રત્યે શરણાગતિ / Kadva bhagat ni sharnagati 🙇‍♀️
item.description: Swaminarayan charitra of kapadvanj modh vanik and kadava bhagat, About asylum of the lord swaminarayan
